titleStmt.title: The lawfulnes of tithes demonstrated to the convincing of such of the Quakers as pretend conscience against the payment of them, or, A demonstration for liberty of conscience to the Quakers in the payment of their tithes by W.J.
titleStmt.author: Jeffery, William, 1616-1693.

notesStmt.note: Caption title: Country-men and friends call'd Quakers.
